/erkan9527-blog/jekyll/2022-05-24-page_c.title: Page with cover image
/erkan9527-blog/jekyll/2022-05-24-page_c.body: The jekyll-gitbook theme supports adding a cover image to a specific page by adding a cover field to the page metadata: --- title: Page with cover image author: Tao He date: 2022-05-24 category: Jekyll layout: post + cover: /assets/jekyll-gitbook/dinosaur.gif ---
